alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 22 at 3:05PM CST until January 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Elevated to critical fire weather conditions possible Tuesday... .Strong northwesterly flow associated with a cold front is expected Tuesday. Relative humidity values are expected to drop into the teens across portions of South Texas behind the front. The combination of low relative humidity values and strong winds will lead to elevated to critical fire weather conditions Tuesday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE SOUTHERN COASTAL PLAINS AND SOUTHERN BRUSH COUNTRY... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low humidity, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Webb, Duval, Jim Wells, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces and Inland San Patricio. * TIMING... * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Webb
